official_title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require periodic cost of living adjustments to the maximum amount of deposit insurance available under such Act to the extent such increase does not cause the reserve ratios of the deposit insurance funds to decline, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Deposit Insurance Adjustment and Protection Act

summary.text: Federal Deposit Insurance Adjustment and Protection Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prescribe a formula for periodic adjustments to the maximum amount of deposit insurance coverage ($100,000), including an inflation adjustment with automatic temporary suspensions to preserve a specified minimum reserve ratio.

titles.title: Federal Deposit Insurance Adjustment and Protection Act

To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require periodic cost of living adjustments to the maximum amount of deposit insurance available under such Act to the extent such increase does not cause the reserve ratios of the deposit insurance funds to decline, and for other purposes.
